ygData.subject: Another intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone!  I m new to this list, and let me just say that I am very happy that this list exists.  I m a lesbian in RL, and I m getting very tired of guys on
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone! I'm new to this list, and let me just say that I am very happy
that this list exists. I'm a lesbian in RL, and I'm getting very tired of
guys on EQ commentating on my character's "nice ass" or asking me to marry
them...so I'm glad that this list is a space where we can all be joined in
"unity" (I like that as the name for the guild). I have a lvl 6 half-elf
paladin on Rodcet Nife named Anaxilea, so I'd be willing to join a guild on
Rodcet Nife. I don't get much time to play EQ, so I'd rather keep playing
this lvl 6 character cuz I level slooooow. However, I'd be willing to create
a new character on Brell if you need more people for that guild. Again,
thanks for starting this list, and a big hello to all of our wonderful,
open-minded straight friends on the list!

Cara
